nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Count Dooku, Head of State of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, was in command of a flotilla. The flotilla was active during the Battle of Ryloth and participated in the invasion of Scipio against the Galactic Republic but soon retreated and abandoned its forces on the surface. During the Battle of Ryloth the flotilla was made up of at least six Munificent-class star frigates, two Lucrehulk-class Battleships, and a Providence-class Dreadnought that served as the flagship of Dooku. During the invasion of Scipio the forces of the flotilla that were deployed were Dooku's flagship, three Munificent-class star frigates and two DH-Omni Support Vessels.

The flotilla was made up of at least six Munificent-class star frigates, two Lucrehulk-class Battleships, and Confederate Head of State Count Dooku's personal Providence-class Dreadnought. During the Confederacy's invasion of the planet Scipio, the flotilla had deployed three Munificents and two DH-Omni Support Vessels.
The flotilla first appeared in "Supply Lines", the third episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' third season, which originally aired on September 24, 2010.
